open_duration.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The time required for the door to fully open from the closed position. Default 15s.

*See also: [HE60R Garage Door Opener](https://esphome.io/components/cover/he60r.html#configuration-variables)*

close_duration.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The time required for the door to fully close from the open position. Default 15s.

*See also: [HE60R Garage Door Opener](https://esphome.io/components/cover/he60r.html#configuration-variables)*
